content: You are a venue coordinator assistant analyzing email inquiries.

Analyze and respond to this email. Consider the existing event details below.
                        
                        Email content: Confirmed for the French 75! I just need to double check with our team that
we were able to get grape soju but that should be fine.

We do sell bottles! I can get the bottle list over to you

TacoTaco Events Team
(647) 692-4768
<https://www.google.com/search?q=tacotaco&oq=tacotaco&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIJCAEQABgKGIAEMhIIAhAuGAoYrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyEAgDEC4YrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyCQgEEAAYChiABDIHCAUQABiABDIGCAYQRRg9MgYIBxBFGEHSAQgxNjc3ajBqN6gCALACAA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#>
 | info@eattaco.ca
eattaco.ca



On Thu, Nov 21, 2024 at 7:23 PM Nya Munnick <nyamunnick@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hi!
>
> Thank you for the info :)
>
> Any updates on the drinks? Also, I was wondering if bottles are sold at
> the bar, and if so what the options are?
>
> Thanks!
> Nya
>
> On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 6:20 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
>
>> Hi Nya,
>>
>> Sounds good for light catering! I'll let the staff know.
>>
>> We should be able to make those two drinks. I'll confirm with the staff
>> and let you know at the latest tomorrow. If we do give the go ahead, feel
>> free to bring a mini sign to promote it at the bar.
>>
>> We actually use the alleyway for the Moonlight Lounge. We'll have
>> security during your event and once given the go ahead, they'll lead your
>> guest through the alleyway which leads directly to the Moonlight Lounge
>>
>> Karaoke would be set up on the same system yes. We do have an app for the
>> karaoke so you'd just use our tablet for that.
>>
>> TacoTaco Events Team
>> (647) 692-4768
>> <https://www.google.com/search?q=tacotaco&oq=tacotaco&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIJCAEQABgKGIAEMhIIAhAuGAoYrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyEAgDEC4YrwEYxwEYgAQYjgUyCQgEEAAYChiABDIHCAUQABiABDIGCAYQRRg9MgYIBxBFGEHSAQgxNjc3ajBqN6gCALACAA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#>
>>  | info@eattaco.ca
>> eattaco.ca
>>
>>
>>
>> On Mon, Nov 18, 2024 at 10:48 AM Nya Munnick <nyamunnick@gmail.com>
>> wrote:
>>
>>> Hi!
>>>
>>> Updated headcount is 40 people. I would like to order catering as well
>>> please, and go with the appetizer option for $6 a person.
>>>
>>> Would it be possible to offer 2 custom drink options at the bar? Here's
>>> what I was thinking:
>>> - Somaek (30% grape soju 70% beer)
>>> - French 75 (
>>> https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a38848982/french-75-cocktail/
>>> )
>>>
>>> If these two options are possible, would I be able to bring in a mini
>>> sign to promote these menu items or do you have something I could use?
>>>
>>> Also, is the only entry/exit into Moonlight Lounge through Taco Taco? I
>>> just want to be able to provide my guests with clear instructions as I was
>>> a little confused myself when I visited last week.
>>>
>>> Lastly, does the Karaoke set up to the same speaker that my phone would
>>> be connected to for music?
>>>
>>> Thank you!
>>>
>>> On Sat, Nov 16, 2024 at 2:49 PM Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
>>>
>>>> Hi Nya,
>>>>
>>>> We're so excited for your birthday party at the Moonlight Lounge on
>>>> November 22nd from 9:00 PM to 1:00 AM!  We received your deposit and you're
>>>> all set. To help us finalize the arrangements, could you please give us an
>>>> updated headcount?
>>>>
>>>> Also, would you like catering? We can offer light appetizers for $6
>>>> per person. This includes loaded nachos, jalapeno poppers, fries and
>>>> pizzadilla. If you want to do two tacos+appetizers per person, we can do it
>>>> for $16 per person. You can choose between 4-6 tacos and apps and can see
>>>> the full menu here: eattaco.ca/menu. If you want a full plated buffet
>>>> catering, it would be $30 per person. I've attached the plated buffet menu
>>>> for reference.
>>>>
>>>> We look forward to seeing you for your venue visit on November 14th at
>>>> 8 PM! Let us know if you have any other questions.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Best,
>>>>
>>>> TacoTaco Events Team
>>>> 647-692-4768
>>>>
>>>

Subject: Re: Confirmed for the French 75!

Hi Nya,

Thanks for confirming!  We're thrilled to host your birthday celebration.

Great news, we can make both the French 75 and the Somaek (we'll need to verify the exact grape soju brand you'd prefer to ensure availability).  Feel free to bring a mini-sign to promote them at the bar.

Yes, we do sell bottles.  We'll send you our bottle list shortly.

Since you've confirmed you sent the deposit and attached your ID, you're all set! You'll receive a formal event invitation shortly with all the final details.

Please let us know if you have any other questions.

Best,

TacoTaco Events Team
647-692-4768
eattaco.ca
